item.title: Absorbing Boundary Conditions
item.description: Overview Methods for numerically calculating the propagation of waves include the Finite Element Method (FEM) and the $k$-space method. These methods assume that waves propagate infinitely, but in actual simulations, waves propagate within a finite grid. This can cause reflections at the boundaries.
